3 Curriculum

(14 kids)

This should be a super fun year. Iâ€™ve been revising the curriculum from last year to this year to be a bit more coherent.

Goals

Learn important skills

  • Typing

  • Word Processing

  • Presentations

  • Online Research

  • Scratch

Understand how technology works

  • Artificial Intelligence

  • CPUs and Calculators

  • Magnets and Electricity

Understand how to use technology appropriately (Digital Citizenship)
